name: RockPaperScissors2D
description:
An ancient master tsu-e-fa asked you to bring back golden relics stolen by cunning wells. Use your might, skill and power to  vanquish you enemies!

The idea is simple - you may transform between 3 forms: paper - rock - scissors(in that order). In each form you can use your abilities to deal with enemies/obstructions.

Input: AD - walk , F- transform, Space - jump,  S-crouch, E-super-ability.

Abilities:

Rock: gives you invulnerability for 3secounds

Paper: lets you soar down in the plane form

Scissors:use your blades to shred enemies and obstacles(btw ONLY scissors can crouch)

Developed by:

Dmity Margulis (code, gamedesign)

Evgenia Zhulanova (art, animations)
